# [Interview #547: Grasping for the Wind Interview: Brandon Sanderson on Towers of Midnight, Entry #12](https://www.theoryland.com/intvmain.php?i=547#12)

#### John Ottinger

The Trollocs, Myrddraal, and Ogier have all but disappeared from the tale. Will these other races of the world ever re-enter the narrative of WOT in any significant way?

#### Brandon Sanderson

Yes.
